typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Sno as string,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as string,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as string,
		{Units Sold} as string,
		{Unit Price} as string,
		{Unit Cost} as string,
		{Total Revenue} as string,
		{Total Cost} as string,
		{Total Profit} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> csvsrc
source(output(
		sno as integer,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as timestamp,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as timestamp,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double,
		iscurrent as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sqlsrc
csvsrc derive(Sno = toInteger(Sno),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Total')), $$ = toDouble($$)),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Unit')), $$ = toDouble($$)),
		each(match(endsWith(name,'Date')), $$ = toDate($$))) ~> TypeCast
TypeCast, sqlsrc lookup(TypeCast@Sno == sqlsrc@sno,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSno
Select1 split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckSno@(NewRows, ExistingRows)
LookupSno select(mapColumn(
		Sno = TypeCast@Sno,
		Region = csvsrc@Region,
		Country = csvsrc@Country,
		{Item Type} = csvsrc@{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel} = csvsrc@{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority} = csvsrc@{Order Priority},
		{Order Date} = TypeCast@{Order Date},
		{Order ID} = csvsrc@{Order ID},
		{Ship Date} = TypeCast@{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold} = TypeCast@{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price} = TypeCast@{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost} = TypeCast@{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue} = TypeCast@{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost} = TypeCast@{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit} = TypeCast@{Total Profit},
		Region = sqlsrc@Region,
		Country = sqlsrc@Country,
		{Item Type} = sqlsrc@{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel} = sqlsrc@{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority} = sqlsrc@{Order Priority},
		{Order Date} = sqlsrc@{Order Date},
		{Order ID} = sqlsrc@{Order ID},
		{Ship Date} = sqlsrc@{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold} = sqlsrc@{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price} = sqlsrc@{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost} = sqlsrc@{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue} = sqlsrc@{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost} = sqlsrc@{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit} = sqlsrc@{Total Profit},
		iscurrent,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
CheckSno@NewRows derive(iscurrent = 1) ~> UpdateIsCurrent
CheckSno@ExistingRows, sqlsrc exists(CheckSno@ExistingRows@Sno == sqlsrc@sno,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 derive(iscurrent = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
UpdateIsCurrent sink(input(
		sno as integer,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as timestamp,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as timestamp,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double,
		iscurrent as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		sno = Sno,
		Region,
		Country,
		{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority},
		{Order Date},
		{Order ID},
		{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit},
		iscurrent,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sqlsink
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		sno as integer,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as timestamp,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as timestamp,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double,
		iscurrent as integer,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
